description.full: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. There are no refunds for this item. (Disclaimer: This version is converted from the original Xbox 360 disc to Games on Demand.  Consequently, the game achievement is set to the maximum of 84%.)  Hellboy™: The Science of Evil gives players the opportunity to experience the epic adventures of the acclaimed comic book hero, fusing action, atmosphere and humor.
description.short: With a look all its own, the world of Hellboy is instantly recognizable and forever memorable. Inviting players to delve deeper into its shadowed recesses, Hellboy’s hyperrealism delivers a depth and detail which sets it apart from mere reality.
